{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$1.9M in 2020-2021 on contracts with IPSOS.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [IPSOS LIMITED PARTNERSHIP](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22IPSOS%20LIMITED%20PARTNERSHIP%22)
- [IPSOS LP](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22IPSOS%20LP%22)
- [Ipsos Limited Partnership](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Ipsos%20Limited%20Partnership%22)

- [IPSOS LTD Partnership](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22IPSOS%20LTD%20Partnership%22)

{{< /details >}}
